147226.「では……君たちの あるじについては\n 引き続き 軍司令部のほうで 治療させよ:
...and as for your master, he will continue
to be treated here at the headquarters. He's
fortunate there was nothing life-threatening.

147227.「ありがとうございました 副団長さま。\n 本当に なんと お礼を言ったらいいの:
Thank you so much, deputy. You have no
idea how grateful we are...

147228.「王国軍の皆さんが 駆けつけてくださらなければ\n 今ごろ どうなっていたことか:
I don't know what would have happened if the
Royal Army hadn't rushed in...

147229.「よくぞ その場を動かずに こらえてくれた。\n 混乱して 動き回っていれば あ:
I'm surprised you all managed to stay calm.
If you had panicked or tried to move around,
you would have attracted monsters.

147230.「ええ……お屋敷が墜落した時の騒ぎで\n 命を落とした 仲間もいます……。\n:
Yes...many of our friends lost their lives
when the mansion crashed down. We all thought
we were done for.

147231.「でも その時……時の指針書に書かれていた\n 内容を 思いだしたんです。:
But then...I remembered what was written in
the guidebook.

147232.「何があっても かがり火をたいて\n あるじを守り 苦難を耐え抜け……と。:
It said, "If disaster strikes: light a
bonfire, protect your master, and stay calm."

147233.「お導きの通りに従ったから 救われたのです。 \n 時の指針書は 私たち エテー:
We survived because we followed the
guidebook. It was our light of hope, as it
is for all the people of Ethene.

147234.「私の指針書には こう書かれています。\n 仲間と共にあれば 必ず 再出発できる:
Mine said "If you are with friends, you
can change your future". It's been hard, but
the three of us will support each other.

147235.「うむ……。あるじの回復を 信じていたまえ。\n 意識が戻り次第 追って連絡させ:
I see...you must keep your master in your
thoughts. We'll contact you once he awakes.
Until then, you all should get some rest.

147236.「む……。旅人かね？\n ここから先は 軍の施設になっていて\n 許可のない者は:
Are you a traveler...? Beyond here is the
headquarters of the Royal Army. No one may
enter without permission.

147237.「私は セオドルト。\n エテーネ王国軍の 副団長を務めている。\n 何か 用件:
My name is Theodort. I am the second-in-
command deputy of the Royal Army. If there is
anything you need, I'm here to help.

147238.<pc>は ラゴウ隊長から 報告書を\nあずかってきたことを セオドルトに話した:
<pc> told Theodort that they had
received a report from Captain Lago.

147239.「……なるほど そうか。\n わざわざ 旅人に託すということは\n 何か 火急の:
I see...if he was in such a hurry that he
entrusted the letter to a traveler, then it
must be important.

147240.「本来なら 軍団長が受け取るべきものだが \n 今は 作戦行動中で お留守にされ:
Normally the lead commander himself would
receive a report like this, but since he is
away, I will receive it on his behalf.

147242.「うむ……よくぞ 届けてくれた。 \n これは ゆゆしき事態だな……。:
Hmm... I'm glad you brought this so quickly.
This is a very serious situation...

147243.「浮島の墜落事故は ドミネウス邸だけではない。\n 同じ時期に 別の浮島も\n:
Domineus Mansion was not the only floating
island to crash. Another one suffered the same
fate around the same time.

147244.「この一連の事故が 異形獣という \n 恐ろしい魔物の仕業だとするなら\n 無視:
If these accidents are being caused by this
so-called "Hexabeast", then we cannot just
ignore it.

147245.「しかし こんなことは 時の指針書にも\n 書かれていなかったはずだが……？:
But why did none of this information appear
in the guidebook...?

147246.「……ああ 旅人の君は 知らないだろうな。\n 先ほどの侍女たちや 王都の人々が:
Ah...but you wouldn't know about that. You've
probably seen everybody carrying around large
books with them, yes?

147247.「あれは すべてのエテーネの国民に １冊ずつ \n 配布される 時の指針書と呼ば:
They're known as Time Guidebooks. Every
citizen in this kingdom is given one.

147248.「エテーネ王国は 時見の箱という装置を使い\n 近い未来を予見することで\n 今:
Much of Ethene's wealth and prosperity can be
attributed to a royal artifact known as the
"Timeseer Box", which can see into the future.

147249.「国王は 未来視の結果を反映した\n 人生において選択すべき行動を\n 時の指針:
The King gives every citizen a guidebook.
Inside is advice, decisions, and rules that
each citizen must strictly adhere to.

147250.「エテーネの国民は 指針書に記されている通りに \n 行動すれば よりよい未来が:
Our people are assured a better future if they
act according to their guidebooks. You may
have noticed it from those maids from before.

147251.「さて……報告書の件だが。\n 軍団長が戻れば 君に くわしい話を\n 聞くこと:
Now...about the report. When the
commander returns, he may ask you for more
details.

147252.「しばらくの間 王都に滞在してもらいたい。\n ……ただし この件は くれぐれも:
Please stay inside the city for a while.
However...please keep this matter a secret.
The last thing we need is causing a panic.

147253.「王都南門の近くに 宿屋がある。\n そこに 君の部屋を 用意させよう。\n 旅:
There is an inn near the city's south gate. I
will arrange a room to be prepared for you.
You must be tired after a long journey here.

147254.「さーて！ ここで とっておきのサプライズ。 \n うるわしきスペシャルゲストの:
Ladies and gentlemen! We have an awfully
special surprise for you all tonight!

147255.「本日 待望の復帰公演！\n 月夜に咲いた ラウラの花……\n エテーネの歌姫:
Tonight, we are proud to present...the highly
anticipated return of the diva of Ethene
herself: Shante!!!!

147256.「届け この思い……\n 響け……皆さんの胸に……。:
I want to express my feelings to you all...
To resonate within all of your hearts...

147257.「今の気持ちを 歌にしました。\n それでは 聴いてください……\n 酒場の皆さ:
My deepest emotions inspired me to write
this song, dedicated to you everyone here...
I hope you will all enjoy it.

147260.「な…なんだ これは！ \n 前と 全然違うじゃないか……\n 頭がガンガンする:
W...what on earth is this?! What an awful
sound...it's making my head throb...!

147264.「おい 嬢ちゃん……ヒック。 \n よくも ひでェ歌を 聞かせてくれたなァ？:
Oi, girlie! (hic) 'ow dare ya' sing such an
awful song!

147265.「ヒック……いい気分が 台無しだぜ。\n どう落とし前つけてくれるんだよ？ ええ:
(hic) Ya' ruined me entire night! Ya' better
make it up to me some'ow! Well?!

147267.「な～にが エテーネの歌姫だ。 \n お前みたいな大オンチ 二度と歌うんじゃねェ:
Ya' really (hic) call yerself the "diva of
Ethene"?! Yer terrible! Ya' should never
sing again!

147269.「なんだァ テメーは？ ヒック……。\n オンチにオンチって言って 何が悪いんだ:
Who the 'ell are you? (hic) Yer not really
thinkin' of defendin' this fraud, are ya?!

147271.「チッ……酔いが さめちまった。\n 別の店で 飲み直さなきゃ やってらんねェぜ:
Tch...looks like me buzz's gone. Gotta find
another place to get me drink on. Can't
stand this nonsense without some booze.

147272.「か……かっこいい……っ！\n あなたの お名前は……？:
You're...amazing! Please, won't you tell me
your name?

147273.「<pc>さん？ <pc>さんね。\n 助けてくれて ありがとう！:
<pc>, is it? Well, <pc>, thank you
so much for saving me!

147274.「ぜひ お礼をさせてほしいわ。\n どんなことなら 喜んでもらえるかしら？\n:
I'd love to give you something as thanks for
saving me. But what can I do for you?
Ummm...hmm....

147275.「そうだわ！ ぜひ うちへ遊びにきて。\n ここから東に ゼフの店っていう\n:
Oh, I know! Why don't you come visit my home!
I live in an alchemy shop called "Zef's Shop"
on the east side of the city.

147276.「たいした おもてなしは できないけど \n あなたのために 一曲歌わせてほしい:
I can't offer much hospitality, but I can
at least sing for you as thanks for saving
me. You'd like that, right? Right?

147277.「おおい シャンテ～～！\n 今の ひどい歌は なんなんだ！？: Hey, Shante! What was that horrible racket?!

147279.「ああ……なんてこったい。\n 今日は もう店じまいだ……\n 早いとこ 出てい:
Oh, this is just perfect...everyone's
already gone for the day...you need
to leave, right now!

147280.「ご…ごめんなさい。あの でも……\n できたら また 歌わせてくださいね。:
I'm really, really sorry. But, if you can...
please let me sing here again.

147281.「それじゃ <pc>さん。\n 本当に ありがとう！ またね～～！:
Thanks again, <pc>! I'll
see you soon!

147282.「とほほ……やっちまったよ。\n 曲芸師や踊り子で 客をもてなせ。\n ただし:
Yep, it's right there: "Entertain your guests
with dancers and jugglers, but DO NOT let
anyone sing". What a fool I am...

147283.「なのに あの子に どうしてもと頼まれて \n ついつい ステージに 上げちまっ:
But even though she insisted and begged so
much, I let her take the stage...this place's
reputation is ruined...

147284.「いやっ！ それ以前に…… \n こんな騒ぎを起こしたら 指針監督官に\n 目を:
No! Even worse...with an incident this
loud, the guideline enforcers might start
watching this place more closely!!

147285.「ああ……シャンテは 王都で人気の歌姫でな。 \n 半年ほど前 ある事件に 巻き:
Yes...Shante was once a popular singer here in
the city, but she had to go on hiatus due to an
incident that happened six months ago...

147286.「ようやく 活動再開と思いきや\n ひどい歌声だったよなあ。話してても\n 以前:
Just when I thought she was going to start
again, she sang so terribly...even her normal
conversations seems like she's not all there.

147287.「あんた あの子に 錬金術の……\n ゼフの店に来るよう 誘われてたな。:
That girl invited you to that alchemy place...
Zef's Shop, was it?

147288.「もし 行くつもりなら 中央広場から\n 東に歩いて 階段を上がった通りにあるぞ:
If you plan to go, walk east from the center
plaza and up the stairs to the street. Look
for the sign with the medicine bottle on it.

147289.「そんでさ……シャンテに 会ったら \n 悪いこと言わないから もう 人前で歌う:
When you see Shante, well...don't be mean to
the poor girl, but...try to tell her nicely
that she shouldn't sing in public anymore.

147292.「あたしは リンカ。 \n この店で働いてる 錬金術師で\n お前が探してる シ:
I'm Linka. I work here as an alchemist, but
more importantly, I'm Shante's sister.

147293.「でだ……うちの妹に 何の用だ？\n お前みたいな旅人が どこでどうやって\n:
So...what is it you want with my dear sister?
How did a foreigner like you even come to
know her?!

147294.「……よくいるんだよな お前みたいなの。 \n シャンテの歌に ホレ込んで 押し:
You people are a dime a dozen. You fall in
love with Shante's singing, and then come
barging in here...honestly, it's annoying.

147295.「知り合いを装って あいつに近づこうってんなら\n このあたしが タダじゃおかな:
So, listen up! If you try to get close to her
or start any kind of funny business, you'll
have to go through me first!

147297.「そうだ そうだーー！\n リンカは しつれいせんばんだぞーーっ！\n おきゃく:
Yes, yes! Linka can be very rude at times.
We must not make our guest uncomfortable!

147298.「な…なんだよ。チュラリスは 関係ないだろっ。\n つーか 裏に隠れてろって！\:
H...hey. Look, this doesn't concern you. And
didn't I tell you to hide in the back? If
THEY came right now you would be...

147301.「エテーネ王国軍 特務機関所属……\n 指針監督官のベルマである。:
I'm Belma. Guideline enforcer of the Royal
Army special intelligence division.

147303.「おや……ふたりとも おそろいとは\n ちょうどよかった。 \n その後 我々の:
Mmm...how good is to see you both here.
I hope you've been following your guidebook
since that little...incident.

147304.「ふむ……。どうやら まだのようだ。\n 貴様ら 錬金術師が持つ 指針書には\n:
What a shame...looks like I was wrong. Clearly
you two have not been following the
clearly-stated guidelines in your guidebooks.

147305.「すべての魔法生物を 処分せよ……と。:
Let me give you a reminder...
"All magical creatures must be disposed."

147306.「このエテーネ王国は 時の指針書に従うことで\n 今日までの 輝かしい栄光を 築:
The Time Guidebook is the foundation upon
which the Kingdom of Ethene flourishes. We
owe everything to its existence.

147307.「国民ならば 子供でさえ理解していることだが\n ……わかっているのか？\n 拒:
This is a fundamental truth that even children
can understand. Keep defying your guidelines,
and you will be charged with treason.

147309.「はっ！ やってみやがれ。 \n あたしたちは 権力や おどしには屈しない……\:
Ha! Go ahead and try it. I won't let you or
anyone else trample on our pride as
alchemists!

147310.「……荒事は よしましょう。\n 今は お客さんが 来ているんです。\n 無関係:
Let's all just settle down. We currently have
a customer here. We wouldn't want to get an
innocent bystander involved, would we?

147311.「…………ちっ。よそ者か。 \n 時の指針書に記載のない者と 関わるのは\n い:
Tch, a foreigner, I see...involving someone
not in the guidebook would be more trouble
than it's worth...

147312.「いいだろう。今日のところは 退いてやる。\n だが 私の指針書は 告げているぞ:
Very well, I'll leave for now. But know
this...my guidebook says that next time,
I will fulfill my mission.

147313.「すべての魔法生物を 処分しろ。\n 貴様らの 賢明な判断を 期待しているぞ。:
All magical creatures must be disposed. I
trust you'll make the right decision, yes?

147314.「驚かせてしまって すみませんね……。\n 旅人のあなたには 何がなんだか\n:
Sorry that you had to see all that...as a
traveler, I assume you don't know what any
of that was about.

147315.「さっきの軍人たちは 指針監督官といって \n 時の指針書に書かれた内容に 従わ:
They call themselves "guideline enforcers".
Their job is to crack down on those who fail
to follow their Time Guidebooks.

147316.「ここ最近 軍の権威を かさに着て \n 王都で 幅をきかせている連中なんですよ:
Recently, they've been using their military
authority to get away with whatever they want.
But it wasn't always like this...

147317.「……これで わかったろ。\n 今 この店は 面倒なことになってんだ。\n お前:
So, there you have it. Our shop is in some
pretty hot water right now, so I don't have
time to deal with creeps like you.

147318.「姉さん……あの女の人たちは 帰ったの？ \n 私たち もう 下に降りてもいい…:
Sis, are the enforcers gone? Can we come
down...?

147319.「って <pc>さん！？\n 待っててね。今 そっちに行くからっ。:
Oh, <pc>!! You're here!
Wait just a moment, I'll be right down!

147320.「えっ……？ なんだよ シャンテ。\n こいつ マジで 知り合いなのか？:
Wait, you actually do know this person?
They're not just some stalker?

147321.「<pc>さんは 私の恩人なの。\n 酔っ払いに カラまれてたのを 助けてくれて:
<pc> is my hero! They saved
me from an angry drunk back at the inn. They
were so cool!

147322.「なんだ……こいつが 例の恩人だったのかよ。\n そういうことなら 早く言えっつ:
Wait...this was the one who saved you?
Why didn't you say anything before?!

147323.「追い返そうとして 悪かったな。\n あたし 妹のことになると ついつい\n マ:
I'm sorry for trying to chase you off. I can
be a little over protective when it comes to
my dear sister. Ahaha!

147324.「酒場では 本当にありがとう！\n 遊びにきてくれて とってもうれしいわ。:
Thank you again for what you did back at the
inn. It was so kind of you to come here and
visit.

147325.「えっ？ 宿屋のモッキンさんから 伝言……？:
Hm? Mr. Mockin asked you to tell me
something...?

147326.「そう……たしかに 迷惑かけちゃったものね。\n 言われた通り もうこれ以上\n:
I see...I did really cause a lot of trouble,
didn't I...? Maybe I really should stop
singing in public...

147327.「そんな 落ち込むことないぞ シャンテ。\n 他の連中には 理解できなくたって\:
Don't be so down, Shante. I like your singing
even if other people can't understand it.

147328.「ありがとう 姉さん。\n ……でも できることなら 多くの人に\n 自分の歌を:
Thanks, sis. But...I really want my songs to
reach as many people as possible.

147329.「私は歌うことが 本当に好きよ。\n この歌で いつか みんなを幸せにしたい。\:
I love singing, and I love making people
happy with my singing. I consider it my
mission as the "diva of Ethene"...

147330.「気持ちは わかるし お前の願いなら \n なんだって かなえてやりたいけど……:
I understand how you feel, and I'll do
everything I can to make your dreams come
true. But maybe...just take a break for now.

147331.「お前は 大ケガから回復したばっかりで\n まだまだ 本調子じゃないだろ？\n:
You've just recovered from a serious injury
and you're not in great shape yet. Besides,
there's an enforcer harassing us right now.

147332.「そうね。あの人たち ちょっと怖いわ……。\n コポも 部屋でおびえていたもの。:
That's true. The enforcers are so scary...
Kopo was terrified while we were hiding
in my room.

147333.「チュラリスとコポは 錬金術師によって\n 生み出された 魔法生物なんです。\n:
Chularis and Kopo are magical creatures
created by alchemists. At first glance, they
appear to be monsters...

147334.「魔法生物は その証として 身体のどこかに\n こういう宝石を 宿しているので\:
Magical creatures are easily identifiable
because they have a gem like this somewhere in
their bodies. It acts as a source of magic.

147335.「チュラリスは 私の助手として\n コポは シャンテの話し相手として\n それぞ:
Chularis and Kopo have served as my assistant
and Shante's companion, respectively.

147336.「チュラリス やくそう いっぱいはこぶ！\n たなに しまっちゃうよ！ しまっち:
Chularis is great at carrying ingredients.
I'll put them all on the shelf! All on the
shelf!

147337.「あたしたちにとって\n 魔法生物は 大切な家族なんだ……。:
To us, these magical creatures are very
important...they're like family.

147338.「こいつらを処分しろだなんて とんでもない！\n たとえ指針書に 書いてあること:
It's outrageous that they're trying to get us
to destroy them. I couldn't care less about
what the guidebooks say!

147339.「…………ん～？\n だけど 何か 忘れてるような……。:
Hmm? But I feel like I'm forgetting
something...

147340.「あーー！ そうだ ジョニールだよっ。\n あいつのこと すっかり忘れてた！:
Ah! That's right, it's Joneal. I totally
forgot about him!

147341.「だから 何度言えば わかんだよッ！\n ネジガラミの根は 品切れ。\n ないも:
How many times do I have to tell you?! We're
out of Nejigarami root! We can't give you what
we don't have!

147342.「そちらこそ 何度言えば 理解できるので？\n 品切れならば 仕入れりゃいいだけ:
How many times do I have to say it? If you're
out of something, then restock it! That's what
a shop is supposed to do, isn't it?!

147343.「いいですか。リンカ様は 有能な執事である\n このジョニールを信頼して おつか:
Got it? Lady Linka entrusted me with this
task. As her extraordinary butler, I, Joneal,
will stop at nothing to fulfill them!

147344.「手ぶらで帰れば 執事の誇りが\n すたるってもんです…… \n さあっ！ 出す:
This poor service has gone on long enough!
Now...would you kindly bring me the
ingredients I have requested, SIR?

147345.「ああ……すいませんね お客さん。\n ちょいと 取り込み中でして……。:
Oh...a customer. Please excuse me. I'm in a
bit of a situation here...

147346.「……はい？ ジョニールは\n たしかに ワタクシのことですが……。:
...Yes? I am indeed Joneal, butler
extraordinaire!

147347.「なな…なんですとぉ！？\n リンカ様が 帰ってこいと……。: Truly?! Lady Linka requested I return?!

147348.「ぐ…ぐぬぬ……しかしっ！\n 任務を途中放棄するなど もってのほか。\n なぜ:
B...but I can't! To abandon such an important
task before completing it...I don't think I
could bear such horrible shame.

147349.「俺は ここの店主のブルーノー。\n ジョニールは うちの常連だし\n 品物を売:
I'm Brunoe, the owner of this place. Joneal is
a regular customer of ours, and I'd love to
sell him some of my wares, but...

147350.「注文の素材……ネジガラミの根は 品切れでね。\n ちょいと バントリユ地方まで:
As I said, we're out of Nejigarami root.
Normally I would harvest the stuff from the
Bantryu Region. However...

147351.「だが……俺の指針書に 書いてあるんです。\n 『バントリユ地方に行ってはいけな:
My guidebook says "Don't go to the Bantryu
Region".

147352.「そっちがその気なら こちらとしても\n 素材が手に入るまでは テコでも動きませ:

spread joy through her singing everywhere
she went. May she rest in peace."

147495.「う…うそよ！？\n こんなの 何かの間違いだわ！？ \n 同じ名前の 他の誰か:
No... no! There must be some mistake! It's
a different Shante. It has to be! ...Right?

147496.「で…でも エテーネの歌姫って…… \n この お墓……なんなの…………。:
B...but...the headstone calls her the "diva of
Ethene". What does this mean...?

147497.「私……姉さんに 聞いてみるわ。 \n 姉さんなら 何か知ってるはずよ……\n:
I'll...I'll ask my sister. She remembers more
than I do, so she must know something...

147498.「ひとまず お店まで戻りましょう……。: Come on...let's go back to the shop.

147500.「シャンテ！？\n お前っ……黙って 部屋から抜け出して\n 今まで どこに行っ:
Shante?! Why did you sneak out without telling
me?! Where have you been?!

147501.「あっ……。ご…ごめんなさい！\n <pc>さんと ちょっと外へ……。:
I'm sorry... <pc> was there
to keep me safe, so I...

147502.「あれほど 家にいろって言ったのに\n 姉さんの言うことが 聞けないのか！？\n:
I told you to stay home! Why did you not
listen?! I can't believe you'd just...!

147503.「……よかった 無事で。\n ホントに……よかった…………。:
I'm just...so glad you're safe. I was...
I was so worried...

147504.「姉さん……？\n どうかしたの。何かあったの……？:
Sis...? What's wrong? Did something
happen...?

147505.「……あなたたちと 入れ違いでした。\n 先ほど ベルマたち……\n 指針監督官:
While you were gone, Belma and her enforcers
barged in without warning.

147506.「彼女は 魔法生物を 強制処分すると言って\n 問答無用で みんなを連れ去りまし:
She said she was going to dispose of our
magical creatures and took everyone away...
No questions asked.

147508.「チュラリスも ジョニールもだ。 \n そしたら お前まで いなくなってて\n:
Chularis and Joneal, too. And then, you were
missing... You have no idea how worried I
was...

147509.「こんなの ひどい……ひどすぎるわ。\n すぐに みんなを連れ戻さなくちゃ！: This is terrible! We need to go rescue them!

147511.「いやよ……どうして止めるの？\n みんなが 殺されるかもしれないのよ！？:
Why are you stopping me?! Do you want all of
them to be killed?!

147512.「あいつらは あたしが 必ず助ける。 \n 今度こそ お前は おとなしくしてろ！:
Shante, please! I'll go save them. You just
stay here, okay? Please!

147513.「いやっ。おとなしくなんて できない！\n 私にだって できることがあるはずだわ:
No! I can't just sit here while our family
is in danger! I have to do something!

147514.「ダメだ！ お前が行ったら……: Absolutely not! If you were to go...

147516.「お前が行ったら……\n ベルマに 殺されてしまうんだよ！！:
If you were to go...
Belma would kill you, too!!

147518.「姉さん。私……自分の お墓を見つけたの。 \n ラウラリエの丘で。花園の奥 海:
Linka...back at Lauralie Hill, behind the
flowerbed, I found a grave overlooking
the sea...

147519.「自分が書いた 日記を見つけたから。 \n 歌が上手になりたくて <pc>さんと:
I found a diary that I had written...and it
said that Laural Nectar could fix my voice.
So <pc> and I went there...

147520.「……な…なんだよ 急に。\n なんのことか わからないな……。:
W...what are you...what is this all of a
sudden? I have no idea what you're talking
about...

147521.「あの お墓……なんなの？ \n 私が殺されるって どういうこと？\n 姉さんは:
Why was my name on the grave...? And why did
you say the enforcers would kill me, too? You
know something, don't you?!

147523.「待たせたな ゼフさん！\n ベルマたちの行き先が わかったぞ。:
Mr. Zef! I found out where the enforcers took
your pals!

147524.「連中は 魔法生物たちを でかいオリに入れた後 \n 南門を出て エテーネ王国領:
They put them in a big cage and left through
the southern gate. I'm pretty sure they went
southwest to the Echoing Sea Cave.

147525.「なるほど……あそこでは 王立アルケミアの\n 失敗作を廃棄しているという ウワ:
I see...there are rumors that that particular
cave is being used as a dumping ground for
failed Royal Alchemia experiments...

147527.「リンカ……このままでは いけないよ。: Linka...we can't keep lying to her.

147528.「わかってる。わかってるさ……。\n いつかは……って思ってた。\n 全部 全部:
I know. I knew this would happen some day.
This is all my fault...

147529.「とにかく……今は シャンテを追いかけたい。\n 冒険者のお前だけが 頼りなんだ:
I'm going after Shante! I know I can depend
on you, so please...please come with me!

147530.「ありがとう <pc>……。\n シャンテを……みんなを 助けよう！:
Thank you... We have to save Shante and the
others...!

147531.「残響の海蝕洞は エテーネ王国領の南東の果て。\n 砂浜から 洞くつに 入る道が:
The Echoing Sea Cave is at the southeastern
end of the Ethene Kingdom Area. There should
be a way to get inside from the beach.

147532.「危険な戦いが 待っているかもしれません……。\n どうか ふたりを守ってやって:
The road ahead is sure to be dangerous.
Please keep both Shante and Linka safe.

147533.「あばばばば……出して 出してくださぁぁい！ \n 有能な執事たる者 勝手に死ね:
Let me out, you...you rapscallions! I won't
allow myself to die in a place as filthy as
this! Hey! Are you even listening to me?!

147534.「いやーーーんっっ。\n おうち かえりたい！ かえりたいぃーーっ！: Nooooo! I want to go home! I want to go home!

147535.「……よくしゃべる 虫ケラどもだ。\n １匹ずつ 引きずり出して\n バラバラに:
What chatty little insects you are...
Shall I drag them out one by one
and dismember them, I wonder...?

147536.「我がエテーネ王国の基盤は 時の指針書にある。\n エテーネの繁栄は 国民が指針:
The Time Guidebook is the very foundation of
Ethene. Its prosperity and the success of its
people is achieved only by adhering to it.

147537.「時の指針書こそ この世の正義だ！\n 時の指針書こそが 福音をもたらすのだッ！:
The guidebook is the law of the world
itself! It is the gospel that guides
Ethene to glory!

147539.「おやおや。ゼフの店の歌姫か……。: Oh? You're that diva from Zef's shop...

147540.「ウソでしょ！？ どうして よりによって\n あなたが 来ちゃうんですかっ！:
What, seriously?! Why have you of all people
come to rescue us?!

147541.「きゃーっ！ きゃーっ！\n シャンテ にげて にげてぇーーっ！！: Aah! Aaah! Shante! Get away, get away!

147542.「時の指針書がないと 幸せになれないなんて\n ウソよ！ 私は 指針書を持ってな:
Saying the guidebook is the only path to happiness is a lie! I don't have one, but I find my own happiness from my sister and
everyone else!

147543.「……時の指針書を 持っていないだと？: Oh? You don't have a Time Guidebook?

147548.「精神エネルギーが 吸収できないだと……？: Hmm? You can't absorb her energy?

147549.「時の指針書を持っていないのも 当たり前だ。\n お前は エテーネ王国の人間では:
No wonder you don't have a guidebook. These
sacred books are given only to HUMANS of
Ethene...

147550.「……ただの 魔法生物なのだから。:
...but you're no human! You're a magical
creature!

147552.「信じられぬというのなら……\n 動かぬ証拠を 突き付けてやろう。:
Confused? Here, let me show you some hard
evidence.

147553.「やっ…やめて！ さわらないで！\n そこには 大きなキズ跡があるから\n 絶対:
Don't...don't! Don't touch that! Sis said it
would hide the scars from my injuries...!

147554.「自分の目で 確かめたことがあるのか？\n ……ないだろう？:
Have you ever seen these scars with your own
eyes? No? Why do you think that is?

147555.「そういう風に しつけられていたのだよ。\n お前の……ご主人様になッ！: Because your master trained you not to look!

147558.「私が行けば ベルマに殺される……。\n それは 魔法生物だから……\n 昔の記:
That's why sis said Belma would kill me too...
That's why I can't remember anything....why
I can't remember who I used to be...

147559.「姉さんは すべて知っていた。\n 知ってて……私に 黙ってたんだわ……。:
She knew everything. She knew...and she
didn't tell me...

147561.「なんだコイツ……！？ どけよっ！\n あたしは みんなを助けるんだ！！:
Get the hell out of my way! I'm taking my
sister and everyone else home!

147562.「わからないな……そこまで執着する理由が。 \n 錬金術師にとって 魔法生物とは:
I'll never understand why you care so much
for these beasts...are they not just mere tools
for you alchemists?

147564.「なるほどな……。家族だからこそ 形すら\n 人間に近づけてみた……というわけだ:
Family! I see, I see... So is that why you
tried making your beasts appear more...human?

147565.「そんなものは 錬金術師のエゴに過ぎない。\n こいつは 家族なんかでなく……:
That's simply your pride as an alchemist
talking. A beast could never be family...

147566.「ただの 悪趣味なドレイ人形ではないか！:
They're just tools...tools meant to be thrown
in the trash!

147567.「その子は……シャンテはっ……。: She's not a tool, or a beast...

147569.「……ふたりを助けなきゃ。\n ラウラリエの花園で やったみたいに\n 私の歌で:
I have to save them! Maybe I can distract it
with my song like I did to the Flower
Dandy...!

147572.「なっ……よせ 落ち着け！\n 私の命令が 聞こえんのかッ！！:
What are you doing?! You dare disobey my
commands!?

147574.「なるほど……時の指針書に書かれていた\n 危険な魔法生物とは 貴様のことか……:
I see...it was you! The dangerous magical
creature the guidebook mentioned. I've
finally found you!

147580.「や…やった……。\n すごいぜ <cs_pchero>っ！:
Y...you did it...
You did amazing, <cs_pchero>!

147582.「シャンテの歌が バケモノを\n コントロール不能にしたんです。\n よっ。さす:
Shante's song drove the foul beast into a
frenzy! Truly a performance worth of the
title "Diva of Ethene"!

147583.「でも 私……歌姫なんかじゃない。: But...that's not who I am, right?

147584.「……ま…まあまあ。\n 細かいことはいいじゃないですか。ねえ？:
Well....ah, you see. Um...let's not worry
about the finer details, yes?

147585.「そーだ そーだーー！ これで おうちに\n かえれるね！ かえれるねーーっっ！:
That's it! That's it! Now we can go home! We
can go home!

147587.「指針監督官は エテーネ軍の特務機関だ。\n 我々に 刃向かうということは\n:
The guideline enforcers are a special branch
of Ethene's military! To oppose us is to
commit treason against the state...

147588.「エテーネ王国の名に ドロをぬった罪は重い！ \n お前たちは ひとり残らず牢獄:
You are all hereby under arrest! You will rot
in the royal prison until the day I personally
execute each and every one of you!

147589.「貴様もだ……こざかしい冒険者め。\n 反逆者として 処罰を受けるがいいッ！！:
And you...! You meddling little interloper!
You will be punished as well, you traitor!

147590.「さて……処罰を受けるのは どちらだろうな？:
Who is that will really receive punishment, I
wonder...?

147594.「エテーネ王国軍 軍団長クオード。: Quard. Commander of the Royal Army of Ethene.

147595.「なにっ……軍団長だって？\n それなら あいつらの仲間じゃないか。:
Royal Army!? So you're after Shante too, is
that it!?

147596.「軍団長の権限において……\n 現時点をもって 指針監督官ベルマと\n その部下:
Calm yourself. Right now, I am here to arrest
Belma and her subordinates and take them
into custody. Nothing more.

147597.「一介の軍人でありながら おのが職分を越え \n 国民を脅迫した罪……その上 得:
You've been threatening citizens, abusing
your authority as a military officer and
using a strange beast to harm others...

147598.「軍法にのっとり この者を追って処罰する。\n ……それ相応の刑が待つと 心得る:
In accordance with military law, you will be
tried for your crimes and will receive a
suitable punishment.

147599.「そんな バカな……！ 指針書に従った私が\n なぜ 罰せられるのだ！？ こんな:
This is absurd!! Why am I being punished for
enforcing our kingdom's guidelines?! They
made no mention of this happening!

147600.「くそっ 何もかも 貴様のせいだ……。\n 指針書通りに 事が運ばなかったのは\:
You! It's all your fault! Our sacred
guidelines were thrown into disarray because
of your incessant meddling!

147601.「哀れだな 指針監督官ベルマ……。\n 優先すべきは 指針書に従うことより\n:
Pathetic... Belma, you should know that the
well-being of Ethene's people supersedes
following the written guidelines.

147603.「俺の管理不行き届きで あの者たちが \n 迷惑をかけてしまったな……すまない。:
I apologize for all the trouble. It was my
lack of supervision that caused this to
happen...

147604.「奴らの横暴には ずっと 頭を悩ませていた。 \n 処罰するタイミングを 計って:
Their tyranny had been bothering me a long time. I've waited for the right moment to punish them, but never imagined they would
go to such extreme lengths.

147605.「しかも 王国を騒がせている怪物を \n あやつるようなマネさえ してみせるとは:
...and to ally themselves with the monster
that's been terrorizing the kingdom...
How could this have happened?

147606.「……シャンテといったか。お前の歌声には \n 異形獣を惑わせる 特殊なチカラが:
Your name is Shante, right? Your voice seems
to be able to confuse the Hexabeasts. The
army would like to ask for your cooperation.

147607.「俺の責任において お前と お前の家族を保護し\n 身の安全を保障すると 約束し:
Don't worry. I'll make sure you and your
family remain safe from any who would try to
cause you trouble.

147609.「ベルマのことは もう心配しなくてよさそうね\n <cs_pchero>さん。:
Looks like we don't have to worry about Belma
anymore, right <cs_pchero>?

147611.「報告書を届けに来た <cs_pchero>とは\n あの時の お前のことだった:
I didn't realize that it was you who came to
see me at the army headquarters. You have a
common name, after all.

147613.「お前には いろいろと聞きたいことがある。 \n 落ち着いたら 軍司令部まで来い:
I have a lot of questions for you. When you
get settled, come to the army headquarters.
I'll tell the guards to let you in.

147615.「いやはや。一時はどうなることかと……。 \n これで一件落着ですね リンカ様っ:
What a glorious ending to our little
escapade! I was worried for a second there,
but it all worked out!

147616.「…………お願い。すべてを聞かせて。: Sis...will you please tell me the truth now?

147617.「ああ……わかった。\n 店に戻ったら すべて話す……約束するよ。:
Yes...I'll tell you everything when we get
back home. I promise.

147618.「悪いけどさ <cs_pchero>……\n お前も ゼフの店まで 来てくれない:
<pc>, you've done so much for
us already, but would you come back to Zef's
too? I want you to hear this as well.

147619.「この日記は 記憶をなくす前に\n 自分で書いたものだと 信じていたわ。:
I had believed that I wrote in this diary
before I lost my memory...

147620.「……でも そうじゃないのよね。 \n 私は 魔法生物だから もともと\n 記憶:
...but now I know that is not true. I am a
magical creature, so I never had a past to
remember in the first place...

147621.「日記を書いたシャンテは 誰なの？\n 私は どうして ここにいるの……？:
Who was the Shante that wrote this diary, and
what does that make me...?

147622.「……私が 話しましょう。\n 姉妹を引き取った 保護者である 私には\n きち:
Let me explain. As the one who took you two
in, it's my responsibility to set things
straight.

147623.「これから話すのは あなたではない\n リンカの本物の妹だった……\n 人間のシ:
What I am about to tell you is not about you,
but about the human Shante...the one who
was Linka's real sister.

147624.「両親と死に別れた 幼い姉妹を引き取り\n 私は 王都の片隅に この店を開きまし:
I opened this store in a corner of the city
after taking in two sisters who had lost
their parents.

147625.「じつの両親が 恋しかったでしょうに\n ふたりは さびしそうな そぶりも見せず:
Despite missing their parents dearly, they
supported each other and grew up to be strong
and kind...

147626.「リンカは 父のような錬金術師を目指して\n 日夜 修業にはげみ 魔法生物の研究:
Linka, who wanted to be an alchemist like her
father, devoted her life to the study of
magical creatures.

147627.「いっぽう 妹のシャンテは 天性の才を活かし \n 歌手として その美しい歌声で:
On the other hand, Shante wanted to use her
natural talent as a singer to soothe the
weary hearts of those who lived here.

147628.「王都の歌姫のウワサは 隣国まで届き \n リンジャハルの大劇場から 招かれたシ:
Word of the "Diva of Ethene" reached
neighboring countries, and Shante was invited
to perform at the Grand Theater in Linjahar.

147629.「シャンテが リンジャハルへと旅立った朝。\n あの時の うれしそうな姉妹の姿を:
That morning Shante left for Linjahar...
I'll never forget how happy they both
looked...

147630.「……悲劇は その後に起きたのです。\n のちに リンジャハルの大災害と呼ばれた:
Then came that horrible tragedy...which has
since been dubbed the "Linjahar Disaster".

147631.「突如現れた 魔物の群れが 都市を破壊し\n 人々をむごたらしく 皆殺しにしまし:
A horde of monsters descended on the city,
reducing it to ruins and killing nearly
everyone within.

147632.「……そう。劇場で 歌っていたシャンテも\n 例外なく巻き込まれ 命を失ったので:
Shante, who was singing in the theater at the
time, was caught right in the middle of it
all...and she lost her life...

147633.「妹を失った リンカの絶望は \n 計り知れないものでした。:
Linka's despair at the loss of her sister was
immeasurable.

147634.「悲しみに泣き暮らし 世をはかなみ\n ついには 命さえ絶とうと……。:
She wept with grief as the days went by...
She even tried to take her own life...

147635.「ですが ある日を境に 彼女は変わりました。\n 自分の部屋に こもりがちになり:
One day, however, something changed. She
locked herself in her room and began
researching advanced alchemical theories.

147637.「あの子の遺体を ラウラリエの丘に葬って\n しばらくした ある日……\n あの:
One day, some time after we buried her in
Laurarie Hill... I went into her room and
found her diary.

147638.「日記の最後のページには\n あたしへの お礼が書かれてた……。:
On the last page of her diary, she thanked
me...

147639.『……歌手として 自信がなかった私を\n はげまして 勇気づけてくれたのは\n:
"I was never confident as a singer, but you
were always there to cheer me on and support
me. I owe everything to you..."

147640.『たとえ 命尽き果てる その時が来ても\n 私は 姉さんのため 歌い続けるわ。\:
"From now until the end of our lives, I want
to be there to sing for you. Forever and
always..."

147641.「あたしも もう一度 あの子に歌ってほしい。\n 心から 強く願った。そして……:
I wanted nothing more than to hear her sweet
song one last time. That's when I made my
decision...

147642.「魔法生物を錬金しよう……\n シャンテそっくりの 人型魔法生物を。:
I would create a magical creature. One that
looks, thinks and acts exactly like Shante.

147643.「死んだ親父は 魔法生物研究の第一人者だった。\n あたしは親父から 研究途中だ:
My father was the leading researcher of
magical creatures. Before he died, he shared
his theory on creating humanoid ones.

147644.「親父さえ 成しとげられなかった\n 人型魔法生物の錬金。成功確率は低いけど\n:
Not even he was able to succeed with his
theories. The chance of success was low, but
I decided that I would still try.

147645.「そんな あたしの望みを 見透かしたように \n 時の指針書には 魔法生物を作っ:
As if it had seen right through my hopes, the
Time Guidebook said that I must not create
magical creatures...

147646.「……それでも あたしは やった。\n シャンテに もう一度 どうしても会いたく:
Even so, I did it. I wanted to see Shante one
more time, so I put all my heart into
alchemizing a humanoid magical creature.

147647.「そしたら……奇跡が起きたんだ！ \n 生まれたんだよ。見た目もそっくりで\n:
That's when...a miracle happened. I had
done it! One that looked just like Shante,
and even loved to sing like her, too...!

147648.「ああ……あたしの思いが 通じたんだ。 \n 妹がよみがえって あたしのもとに\:
I thought my prayers had been answered. I
thought my dear beloved sister had come back
to me.

147649.「……その後は お前も知っての通りさ。\n 記憶がないのは ケガの後遺症だってウ:
...and you know the rest. I lied to you and told you your amnesia was because of an injury, and taught you to be like the old
Shante.

147650.「性格や口調 食べ物の好み\n 好きだった歌のこと 人間関係まで……\n お前は:
Your personality, your tone, your taste in
food, the songs you liked to sing, even your
relationships...you believed all of it.

147651.「だけど ひとつだけ 本物のシャンテに \n なりきれないところが あったんだよ:
But there was one thing that kept you from
being just like the real Shante.

147653.「それでも お前は あたしのために\n 歌が上手だった 元の自分に戻ろうとして\:
Even still, you continued to try and get your
voice back so you could sing for me again.
Just like she promised...

147654.「戻るべき自分なんて はじめからないのに。 \n お前は これっぽっちも疑わずに:
Deep down, I felt terrible. I lied to you, and
yet you believed me with all your heart...

147655.「何度も 真実を打ち明けようと思った。\n でも……どうしても できなかったんだ:
I wanted to tell the truth so many times.
But...I just couldn't do it.

147656.「お前に真実を告げたら この暮らしが\n 全部 壊れちゃうんじゃないかと思って…:
I was afraid that the truth would be too much
for you, and that it would destroy the
peaceful life we had just regained. And...

147657.「もう二度と 妹を 失いたくないから……！: I didn't want to lose my sister again...!

147658.「どうか ご自分を責めないでください\n リンカ様……。: Please don't blame yourself, Lady Linka.

147659.「いいや……あたしが 間違ってたんだ。\n シャンテを ずっと だましてきた。\:
No...I was wrong. I've been deceiving Shante
for far too long. It's all my fault...

147660.「ごめんな シャンテ……。\n 今まで……ホントに ごめん……。:
I'm sorry, Shante... for everything...
I'm so...so sorry...

147661.「ええ……私 つらかった。\n なんでも言い合える姉妹だと 思ってたのに\n 隠:
It was hard on me. I thought we were sisters who could talk to each other about anything, but to find out that you were hiding things
from me...it was quite the shock.

147662.「だからこそ これからは\n お互いに なんでも言い合える\n ……そんな姉妹に:
So, from now on...let's be sisters who can
be honest with each other about anything.

147663.「私は たしかに 本物のシャンテじゃなくて\n 姉さんに作られた 魔法生物かもし:
I may be a magical creature you created, and

147664.「でも……私にとっての 姉さんは\n 他の誰でもない あなただけよ。:
But you're still my only sister. I can't say
that about anyone else.

147665.「私は まぎれもない 私自身の意思で…… \n あなたのために 歌いたいと思って:
Even after learning the truth, I still feel
the same way I did before.

147666.「姉さんのために 歌い続けたい。\n ずっと ずっとよ……。:
I want to be there to sing for you.
Forever and always...

147668.「これまでも これからも 私たちは姉妹よ。\n 私は あなたのそばにいる。\n:
We have been and always will be sisters.
I will become the diva who will always be
by your side to sing for you.

147669.「……それとも 歌が下手な妹じゃ だめ？:
Or...maybe not. I wouldn't want to hurt
your ears.

147671.「<pc>さん……あなたと 出会わなければ\n いったい どうなっていたかしら。:
<pc>, I seriously wonder what would
have happened if we hadn't met you.

147672.「ベルマから みんなを救ってくれて……\n こうして 姉さんとも わかり合えたの:
You saved us all from Belma...and I owe
everything to you for bringing me closer to my
sister.

147673.「もっと ゆっくりしてってほしいけど……\n あの軍団長から 呼び出されてるんだ:
I'd like for you to stay awhile, but you've
got a date with the army commander, right?
He said to meet him at the army headquarters.

147674.「これは 少ないけど あたしたちの気持ちだ。\n エンリョなく 受け取ってくれよ:
It's not much, but I want you to have this.
Consider it a gift for all you've done for us.

147675.「私も！ <pc>さんのために\n 心を込めて お礼の歌を歌うわ。\n それでは:
Me too!!! I'll sing a song of thanks with all
my heart for you, <pc>.
Please listen...

147676.「わーっ！ いいから やめとけって。\n もうちょい練習してから 聴いてもらおう:
Whoa. Why don't we practice a some more
first, okay? We can surprise them
later once you improve!

147677.「ふふっ。姉さんが言うなら そうするわ！\n また いつでも 歌を聴きにきてね。:
Hmmm? If you say so, sis. Thank you again,
<pc>. Come back anytime, and I'll
gladly sing for you!

147678.「ああ。もしも 錬金術が必要になったら\n いつでも 訪ねてくれよな。\n お前:
Oh, and if you ever need any alchemy done,
come and see me. You've earned more than a
few favors.

147679.「また会いましょう <pc>さん。\n 本当に 本当に……ありがとう！:
See you again, <pc>.
Thank you, so much...for everything!

166678.「はは……はははははっ……！\n なるほど……なるほどな。:
Aha...hahahahaha! I get it...
I finally get it.

170098.「姉さんは いつだって 味方になってくれる。\n だから がんばろうって思えるの:
You're always on my side. That's why I'm able
to try my hardest.

183380.「ちょっとヤバいな これ……。\n あーっ どうしよう……？: This is not good... What should I do...?
